io.github.prolobjectlink.db

Interface StorageManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Container, Defragtable, PersistentContainer, Restorable, Transactional, Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStorageManager, PrologStorageManager

    public interface StorageManager
extends PersistentContainer
    Storage Manager is a file system manager to store data. Is an specification of of PersistentContainer that manage many file and data folders. The storage manager have two mode Storage and StoragePool indicate by StorageMode. Single storage can be more faster for few data. Storage pool distribute all data in short data file limited by data number.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jose Zalacain
    See Also:
    Storage, StoragePool
